title: ESPN Enters the Sportsbook Scene (Podcast)
itunes:title: ESPN Enters the Sportsbook Scene (Podcast)
description:
Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the biggest stories in the Business of Sports. Hot off the press, ESPN inks a sports betting deal worth at least 3 billion dollars. Our in-house handicapper Michael Barr shares his thoughts and we find out if Lynchie will finally get in on the action. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
